Symbol.Script_3D:
! Tank Condensate Receiver
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -A/2+endRed, B/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+endRed, -B/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-endRed, -B/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-endRed, B/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+endRed, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-endRed, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2+endRed, 0, B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2-endRed, 0, B, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- TANK --- !
IF Constatus_6 THEN GROUP "Tank" ADD -A/2, 0, B/2 CALL "MEP_m_Tank" PARAMETERS tankLen = A, tankDia = B, endRed = endRed, ringOn = 0, typ = 2, tankPos = 0, tankMat = MainBoxMaterial, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, res = res DEL 1 IF Constatus_6 THEN ENDGROUP
ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, -B/2, 0, 913, B/2, 360, 4013 DEL 1
IF Constatus_1 THEN ADD ConPosX_1, 0, B/2 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, B/2, 16, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_1/2, 360, 4001 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF Constatus_2 THEN ADD ConPosX_2, 0, B/2 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, B/2, 16, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_2/2, 360, 4001 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF Constatus_3 THEN ADD ConPosX_3, 0, B/2 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, B/2, 16, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_3/2, 360, 4001 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF Constatus_4 THEN ADD ConPosX_4, 0, 0 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, B/2, 32, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_4/2, 360, 4001 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF Constatus_5 THEN ADD ConPosX_5, 0, 0 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, B/2, 32, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_5/2, 360, 4001 DEL 1 ENDIF CUTEND
IF Constatus_6 THEN GROUP "Pipe" ADD 0, ConPosY_6, B/2 ROTy -90 EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, ABS(ConPosX_6), 1+2+16, 0, 0, 901, ConWidth_6/2, 360, 4001 DEL 2 ENDGROUP
Tank_with_Pipe = ADDGROUP ("Tank", "Pipe")
PLACEGROUP Tank_with_Pipe
KILLGROUP "Tank" KILLGROUP "Pipe" KILLGROUP Tank_with_Pipe ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 12, ConEdgeVisible_1 = 0, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 12, ConEdgeVisible_2 = 0, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 12, ConEdgeVisible_3 = 0, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 12, ConEdgeVisible_4 = 0, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 12, ConEdgeVisible_5 = 0, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConPosZ_6=ConPosZ_6, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 13, ConEdgeVisible_6 = 0 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Tank Condensate Receiver
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2+endRed, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2-endRed, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2-endRed, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2+endRed, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
ADD2 -A/2, 0 CALL "MEP_m_Tank" PARAMETERS tankLen = A, tankDia = B, endRed = endRed, ringOn = 0, typ = 2, tankPos = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_pen = gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen = gs_back_pen, gs_fill_type = gs_fill_type, hptsID = 100 DEL 1
LINE2 A/2-endRed, -B/2, A/2-endRed, B/2 LINE2 -A/2+endRed, -B/2, -A/2+endRed, B/2
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
IF Constatus_6 THEN ConPosX_6L = -(A/2-rr+SQR(rr^2-(ABS(ConPosY_6+ConWidth_6/2))^2)) ConPosX_6R = -(A/2-rr+SQR(rr^2-(ABS(ConPosY_6-ConWidth_6/2))^2))
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, ConPosX_6, 0, 1, 0, 1, 801, ConPosX_6L, ConPosY_6+ConWidth_6/2, 1001, ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6+ConWidth_6/2, 0
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, ConPosX_6, 0, 1, 0, -1, 801, ConPosX_6R, ConPosY_6-ConWidth_6/2, 1001, ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6-ConWidth_6/2, 0 ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 2, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 2, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 2, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 2, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 2, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConPosZ_6=ConPosZ_6, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 13, ConEdgeVisible_6 = 0 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Tank Condensate Receiver
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF B < 0.30 THEN B = 0.30 PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF ENDIF
endRed = B*0.2 alpha = 180-2*ATN((B/2)/endRed) rr = (B/2)/SIN(alpha)
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN wmin = 0.30+endRed*2 IF A < wmin THEN A = wmin VALUES "A" RANGE [wmin, ]
IF B > A*2 THEN B = A*2 PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF ZZYZX = B VALUES "B" RANGE [0.30, A*2]
endRed = B*0.2 alpha = 180-2*ATN((B/2)/endRed) rr = (B/2)/SIN(alpha) ENDIF
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Tank Condensate Receiver
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[6] FOR i = 1 TO 6 ui_con_type[i] = 0 NEXT i
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Tank Condensate Receiver
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ZZYZX LOCK "ZZYZX"
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 6
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_1 > MIN(A-endRed*2, B) THEN ConWidth_1 = MIN(A-endRed*2, B) IF ConWidth_1 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, MIN(A-endRed*2, B)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_1" VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0, ]
leftDist = -A/2+ConWidth_1/2+endRed rightDist = A/2-ConWidth_1/2-endRed IF ConPosX_1 < leftDist THEN ConPosX_1 = leftDist IF ConPosX_1 > rightDist THEN ConPosX_1 = rightDist VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE [leftDist, rightDist] PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = B ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_2 > MIN(A-endRed*2, B) THEN ConWidth_2 = MIN(A-endRed*2, B) IF ConWidth_2 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_2 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, MIN(A-endRed*2, B)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_2" VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0, ]
leftDist = -A/2+ConWidth_2/2+endRed rightDist = A/2-ConWidth_2/2-endRed IF ConPosX_2 < leftDist THEN ConPosX_2 = leftDist IF ConPosX_2 > rightDist THEN ConPosX_2 = rightDist VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE [leftDist, rightDist] PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = B ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #3`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_3 > MIN(A-endRed*2, B) THEN ConWidth_3 = MIN(A-endRed*2, B) IF ConWidth_3 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_3 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, MIN(A-endRed*2, B)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_3" VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0, ]
leftDist = -A/2+ConWidth_3/2+endRed rightDist = A/2-ConWidth_3/2-endRed IF ConPosX_3 < leftDist THEN ConPosX_3 = leftDist IF ConPosX_3 > rightDist THEN ConPosX_3 = rightDist VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [leftDist, rightDist] PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = B ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #4`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_4 > MIN(A-endRed*2, B) THEN ConWidth_4 = MIN(A-endRed*2, B) IF ConWidth_4 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_4 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_4 = ConWidth_4 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, MIN(A-endRed*2, B)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConWidth_4 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_4" VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0, ]
leftDist = -A/2+ConWidth_4/2+endRed rightDist = A/2-ConWidth_4/2-endRed IF ConPosX_4 < leftDist THEN ConPosX_4 = leftDist IF ConPosX_4 > rightDist THEN ConPosX_4 = rightDist VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [leftDist, rightDist] PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 5th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 5 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #5`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_5 > MIN(A-endRed*2, B) THEN ConWidth_5 = MIN(A-endRed*2, B) IF ConWidth_5 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_5 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_5 = ConWidth_5 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_5" RANGE (0, MIN(A-endRed*2, B)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_5 = ConWidth_5 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_5" VALUES "ConLength_5" RANGE [0, ]
leftDist = -A/2+ConWidth_5/2+endRed rightDist = A/2-ConWidth_5/2-endRed IF ConPosX_5 < leftDist THEN ConPosX_5 = leftDist IF ConPosX_5 > rightDist THEN ConPosX_5 = rightDist VALUES "ConPosX_5" RANGE [leftDist, rightDist] PARAMETERS ConPosY_5 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_5 = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_5, ConPosY = ConPosY_5, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_5, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_5, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_5, ConWidth = ConWidth_5, ConDepth = ConDepth_5, ConLength = ConLength_5, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_5, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_5, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_5, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_5, ConToolType = ConToolType_5, ConStatus = ConStatus_5, ConType_5 = ConType_5, ConConnectorType_5 = ConConnectorType_5, ConSystem_5 = ConSystem_5, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_5, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 6th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 6 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #6`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_6 > B/2 THEN ConWidth_6 = B/2 IF ConWidth_6 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_6 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_6 = ConWidth_6 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_6" RANGE (0, B/2] PARAMETERS ConDepth_6 = ConWidth_6 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_6" VALUES "ConLength_6" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosY_6 < -B/2+ConWidth_6/2 THEN ConPosY_6 = -B/2+ConWidth_6/2 IF ConPosY_6 > B/2-ConWidth_6/2 THEN ConPosY_6 = B/2-ConWidth_6/2 VALUES "ConPosY_6" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_6/2, B/2-ConWidth_6/2] PARAMETERS ConPosX_6 = -(A/2-rr+SQR(rr^2-(ABS(ConPosY_6))^2)) PARAMETERS ConPosZ_6 = B/2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_6, ConPosY = ConPosY_6, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_6, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_6, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_6, ConWidth = ConWidth_6, ConDepth = ConDepth_6, ConLength = ConLength_6, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_6, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_6, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_6, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_6, ConToolType = ConToolType_6, ConStatus = ConStatus_6, ConType_6 = ConType_6, ConConnectorType_6 = ConConnectorType_6, ConSystem_6 = ConSystem_6, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_6, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
